prompts: Create a Pokémon that thrives in snowy mountains with icy abilities and a frosty appearance.
Generate an ice-type Pokémon designed to blend seamlessly with evergreen forests and icy conditions.
Imagine a Pokémon with a snowy body and teal leaves, showcasing a powerful presence in battles.
Show me a unique Pokémon that embodies a blend of ice and grass elements, perfect for winter environments.
Design an imposing creature with snowy fur and green foliage, ready to face off against trainers in contests.
Give me a visual concept of a Pokémon that has snowy features, ideal for habitats rich in flora and frost.
